rdfs:label: The knora-api ontology in the complex schema

@graph.rdfs:label: Annotation
@graph.rdfs:comment: A generic class for representing annotations
Represents an audio file

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation (Audio)
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a file containing audio data
Represents a boolean value
Represents a color in HTML format, e.g. "#33eeff"
This represents some 3D-object with mesh data, point cloud, etc.

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation (3D)
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a file containg 3D data
Represents a Knora date value
Represents an arbitrary-precision decimal value
Represents a geometrical objects as JSON string
Represents an integer value
Represents a time interval, e.g. in an audio recording

@graph.rdfs:label: Link Object
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a generic link object
A reification node that describes direct links between resources
Represents a flat or hierarchical list
Represents a moving image file

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation (Movie)
@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource containing moving image data

@graph.rdfs:label: Region
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometric region of a resource. The geometry is represented currently as JSON string.

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation
@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource that can store a file

@graph.rdfs:label: Resource
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents something in the world, or an abstract thing
Represents a boolean in a TextValue
Represents a color in a TextValue
Represents a knora-base value type in a TextValue
Represents a date in a TextValue
Represents a decimal (floating point) value in a TextValue
Represents an integer value in a TextValue
Represents an internal reference in a TextValue
Represents an interval in a TextValue
Represents a reference to a Knora resource in a TextValue
Represents a standoff markup tag
Represents a timestamp in a TextValue
Represents an arbitrary URI in a TextValue
A file containing a two-dimensional still image

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation (Image)
@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource that can contain a two-dimensional still image file
A text file such as plain Unicode text, LaTeX, TEI/XML, etc.

@graph.rdfs:label: Representation (Text)
@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource containing a text file
Represents a timestamp
Represents a URI
The base class of classes representing Knora values

@graph.rdfs:label: a TextRepresentation representing an XSL transformation that can be applied to an XML created from standoff. The transformation's result is ecptected to be HTML.
@graph.rdfs:comment: a TextRepresentation representing an XSL transformation that can be applied to an XML created from standoff.  The transformation's result is ecptected to be HTML.

@graph.rdfs:label: ARK URL
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides the ARK URL of a resource or value.

@graph.rdfs:label: attached to project
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects something to a project

@graph.rdfs:label: attached to user
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects something to a user

@graph.rdfs:label: Audio file value has duration
@graph.rdfs:comment: The duration of an audio file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: author
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifies the author of a particular version of a resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: Boolean value as decimal
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal boolean value of a BooleanValue.

@graph.rdfs:label: can be instantiated
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a resource class can be instantiated via the Knora API.

@graph.rdfs:label: Color value as color
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal RGB value of a ColorValue.
Indicates when a resource was created

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has calendar
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the calendar of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has end day
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the end day of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has end era
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the end era of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has end month
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the end month of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has end year
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the end year of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has start day
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the start day of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has start era
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the start era of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has start month
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the start month of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Date value has start year
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the start year of a date value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Decimal value as decimal
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal decimal value of a DecimalValue.
A comment explaining why a resource or value was marked as deleted
Indicates when a resource or value was deleted
Indicates who deleted a resource or value

@graph.rdfs:label: Document file value has X dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The horizontal dimension of a document file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document file value has Y dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The vertical dimension of a document file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document file value has page count
@graph.rdfs:comment: The page count of a document file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: error
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides an error message

@graph.rdfs:label: File value as URL
@graph.rdfs:comment: The URL at which the file can be accessed.

@graph.rdfs:label: File value has filename
@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the file that a file value represents.

@graph.rdfs:label: Geometry value as JSON
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a 2D geometry value as JSON.

@graph.rdfs:label: Geoname value as Geoname code
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal Geoname code of a GeonameValue.

@graph.rdfs:label: has audio file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an audio file

@graph.rdfs:label: Color
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifies the color of a region.

@graph.rdfs:label: Comment
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a comment on a resource as a knora-base:TextValue

@graph.rdfs:label: has 3D-file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a 3D-file

@graph.rdfs:label: has document
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a document

@graph.rdfs:label: has file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a file

@graph.rdfs:label: Geometry
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometrical shape.

@graph.rdfs:label: has incoming link
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this resource referred to by another resource

@graph.rdfs:label: has Link to
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a direct connection between two resources

@graph.rdfs:label: has Link to
@graph.rdfs:comment: Points to a LinkValue reification describing a link between two resources

@graph.rdfs:label: has movie file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a movie file

@graph.rdfs:label: has Representation
@graph.rdfs:comment: References an instance of a Representation. A Representation contains the metadata of a digital object (= file) which represents some physical entity such as an image, a sound, an encoded text etc.

@graph.rdfs:label: has Standoff Link to
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a link in standoff markup from one resource to another.

@graph.rdfs:label: has Standoff Link to
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a link in standoff markup from one resource to another.

@graph.rdfs:label: has image file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an image file

@graph.rdfs:label: has text file
@graph.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a text file

@graph.rdfs:label: Integer value as integer
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal integer value of an IntValue.

@graph.rdfs:label: interval value has end
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the end position of an interval.

@graph.rdfs:label: interval value has start
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the start position of an interval.

@graph.rdfs:label: is shared
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether an ontology is built into Knora
Exists and is true if the resource has been deleted

@graph.rdfs:label: is editable
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property's values can be updated via the Knora API.

@graph.rdfs:label: is inherited
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a cardinality has been inherited from a base class

@graph.rdfs:label: is link property
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property points to a resource

@graph.rdfs:label: is link value property
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property points to a link value (reification)
Indicates if the given resource is the main resource of a request or a resource referred to by a link property.

@graph.rdfs:label: is part of
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this resource is part of another resource

@graph.rdfs:label: is region of
@graph.rdfs:comment: Region of interest within a digital object (e.g. an image)

@graph.rdfs:label: is region of
@graph.rdfs:comment: Region of interest within a digital object (e.g. an image)

@graph.rdfs:label: is resource class
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether class is a subclass of Resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: is shared
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether an ontology can be shared by multiple projects

@graph.rdfs:label: is standoff class
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether class is a subclass of StandoffTag.

@graph.rdfs:label: is value class
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether class is a subclass of Value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Link value has source
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the source resource of a link value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Link value has source IRI
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the IRI of the source resource of a link value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Link value has target
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the target resource of a link value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Link value has target IRI
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the IRI of the target resource of a link value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Hierarchical list value as list node
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a reference to a hierarchical list node.

@graph.rdfs:label: Name of a mapping (will be part of the mapping's Iri)
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the name of a mapping

@graph.rdfs:label: May have more results
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether more results may be available for a search query

@graph.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has X dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The horizontal dimension of a moving image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has Y dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The vertical dimension of a moving image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has duration
@graph.rdfs:comment: The duration of a moving image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has frames per second
@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of frames per second in a moving image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: new modification date
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifies the new modification date of a resource

@graph.rdfs:label: next standoff start index
@graph.rdfs:comment: The next available knora-api:standoffTagHasStartIndex in a sequence of pages of standoff.

@graph.rdfs:label: Object type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the objects of a property

@graph.rdfs:label: ontology name
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the short name of an ontology
The base property of properties that point from Knora resources to Knora resources or values. These properties are required to have cardinalities in the resource classes in which they are used.

@graph.rdfs:label: result
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides a message indicating that an operation was successful

@graph.rdfs:label: Sequence number
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates the position of a resource within a sequence

@graph.rdfs:label: standoff tag has end parent index
@graph.rdfs:comment: The next knora-api:standoffTagHasStartIndex of the end parent tag of a standoff tag.

@graph.rdfs:label: standoff tag has start parent index
@graph.rdfs:comment: The next knora-api:standoffTagHasStartIndex of the start parent tag of a standoff tag.

@graph.rdfs:label: Still image file value has X dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The horizontal dimension of a still image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Still image file value has Y dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: The vertical dimension of a still image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Still image file value has IIIF base URL
@graph.rdfs:comment: The IIIF base URL of a still image file value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Subject type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the subjects of a property

@graph.rdfs:label: Text value as HTML
@graph.rdfs:comment: A text value represented in HTML.

@graph.rdfs:label: Text value as XML
@graph.rdfs:comment: A Text value represented in XML.

@graph.rdfs:label: text value has language
@graph.rdfs:comment: Language code attached to a text value.

@graph.rdfs:label: Text value has mapping
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates the mapping that is used to convert a text value's markup from from XML to standoff.

@graph.rdfs:label: text value has markup
@graph.rdfs:comment: True if a text value has markup.

@graph.rdfs:label: text value has max standoff start index
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum knora-api:standoffTagHasStartIndex in a text value.

@graph.rdfs:label: text value has standoff
@graph.rdfs:comment: Standoff markup attached to a text value.

@graph.rdfs:label: URI value as URI
@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal URI value of a UriValue.

@graph.rdfs:label: user has permission
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides the requesting user's maximum permission on a resource or value.
A plain string representation of a value
A comment on a value
The UUID of a value

@graph.rdfs:label: version ARK URL
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides the ARK URL of a particular version of a resource or value.

@graph.rdfs:label: version date
@graph.rdfs:comment: Provides the date of a particular version of a resource.
